definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: Do you have ants in your pants? = Why are you fidgeting so much?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么这么坐立不安？

sentences.english: She fidgeted in her chair as she took a deep, tremulous breath.
sentences.chinese: 她在椅子上坐立不安，轻颤着深吸了一口气。

sentences.english: She was restless and even agitated.
sentences.chinese: 她坐立不安，甚至心乱如麻。

sentences.english: From their body language you can tell they're fidgeting,
sentences.chinese: 从他们的肢体语言可以看出他们有点坐立不安。

sentences.english: Mrs. Bennet was quite in the fidgets .
sentences.chinese: 班纳特太太听到这消息，简直坐立不安。

sentences.english: Why do you have ants in your pants today? you can't sit still for one second.
sentences.chinese: 你为什么今天坐立不安呢？你连坐一秒钟都不行。

sentences.english: I got antsy and wanted to move ahead to more luminous discussions.
sentences.chinese: 我坐立不安，并希望得到前进更明亮的讨论。

sentences.english: Or you could take all this as a license to fidget.
sentences.chinese: 或者你可以把这作为坐立不安的一个理由。

sentences.english: Drouet fidgeted. Hurstwood moved his toe the least bit.
sentences.chinese: 杜洛埃坐立不安了，赫斯渥却一点不动声色。

sentences.english: Cabin fever is restlessness from being in a confined area.
sentences.chinese: 幽居病是由于身处受限区域而产生的坐立不安。

sentences.english: His remarks were so ill-judged that his girl friend squirmed with embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 他的话太不合适宜，窘得他的女友坐立不安。

sentences.english: When night came, Cassim's wife became very uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚来临时，凯辛的太太变得坐立不安。

sentences.english: The coffee tasted terrible and I kept fidgeting in my seat.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡难喝极了，我在座位上坐立不安。

sentences.english: There's also been much hand- wringing over ballooning mortgage debt.
sentences.chinese: 不断膨胀的抵押贷款债务也令人坐立不安。
“他总是坐立不安，”惠特曼回忆。

definition: unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
to be on tenterhooks (idiom)/to be anxious and frightened
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
to be preoccupied (idiom)/to be inattentive/to be frightened out of one's mind
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
